Parameters: Object: the object being protected by the guard.
checkGuard(java.lang.Object).Description: Determines whether or not to allow access to the guarded object object. Returns silently if access is allowed. Otherwise, throws a SecurityException.

ClassDesc: This interface represents a guard, which is an object that is used to protect access to another object. This interface contains a single method, checkGuard, with a single object argument. checkGuard is invoked (by the GuardedObject getObject method) to determine whether or not to allow access to the object.
